channel.title: [508] Summoned monsters won't follow me or show right face on summoning tab?
channel.description: Okay well when I press summon they get spawned but then when I click on the summoning tab, the face is just a guys face and below it it says Dwarf Remains, and when I walk away from it, it doesn't follow me. I used this tutorial: http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=91354 But it won't work, help please.

item.title: [508] Summoned monsters won't follow me or show right face on summoning tab?

item.title: [508] Summoned monsters won't follow me or show right face on summoning tab?
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

no but i have summoning.java here it is:

[code]package palidino76.rs2.io.packets;

import palidino76.rs2.io.packets.ItemOption1;
import palidino76.rs2.Engine;
import palidino76.rs2.players.Player;

public class Summoning {
public boolean summonOption1(Player p, int pouchid){
ItemOption1 i = new ItemOption1();
int Item = 0;
int NpcID = 0;
int AddXP = 0;
int LvlReq = 0;
int Tab = 63;
String Name = “”;
switch(pouchid){

                case 12175: // Spirit Wolf
                    LvlReq = 1;
                    Item = 12047;
                    Name = "Spirit Wolf";
                    Tab = 663;
                    NpcID = 6829;
                    AddXP = 100;
                break;
                
                case 12176: // Dreadfowl
                    LvlReq = 4;
                    Item = 12043;
                    Name = "Dreadfowl";
                    Tab = 663;
                    NpcID = 6825;
                    AddXP = 150;
                break;
                
                case 12177: // Spirit Spider
                    LvlReq = 10;
                    Item = 12059;
                    Name = "Spirit Spider";
                    Tab = 663;
                    NpcID = 6841;
                    AddXP = 200;
                break;
                
                case 12178: // Thorny Snail
                    LvlReq = 13;
                    Item = 12019;
                    Name = "Thorny Snail";
                    Tab = 663;
                    NpcID = 6829;
                    AddXP = 250;
                break;
                
                case 12179: // Granite Crab
                    LvlReq = 16;
                    Item = 12009;
                    Name = "Granite Crab";
                    Tab = 663;
                    NpcID = 6769;
                    AddXP = 260;
                break;
                
                case 12180: // Spirit Mosquito
                    LvlReq = 17;
                    Item = 12778;
                    Name = "Spirit Mosquito";
                    Tab = 663;
                    NpcID = 7331;
                    AddXP = 280;
                break;
                
		default:
		return false;
	}
            if (p.SummonDelay == 0){
                if (p.skillLvl[23] >= LvlReq){
                    Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, Item, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, Item), 1);
                    p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Summon A " + Name + " .");
                    p.frames.setTab(p, 80, Tab);
                    Engine.newNPC(NpcID, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
                    p.addSkillXP(AddXP, 23);
                    p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
                    p.SummonDelay = 4;
                }
                if (p.skillLvl[23] < LvlReq){
                    p.SummonDelay = 1;
                    p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level " + LvlReq + " to Summon " + Name + " .");
                }
            }
            return true;
}

}[/code]

And itemoption1.java, here that is:

[code]/*

  • Class ItemOption1
  • Version 1.0
  • Thursday, August 21, 2008
  • Created by Palidino76
    */

package palidino76.rs2.io.packets;

import palidino76.rs2.Engine;

import palidino76.rs2.players.Player;
import palidino76.rs2.util.Misc;
import palidino76.rs2.Server;

import palidino76.rs2.players.items.PlayerItems;

public class ItemOption1 implements Packet {
/**
* Handles first item options, excluding things such as eating and drinking.
* @param p The Player which the frame should be handled for.
* @param packetId The packet id this belongs to.
* @param packetSize The amount of bytes being recieved for this packet.
/
public void handlePacket(Player p, int packetId, int packetSize) {
if (p == null || p.stream == null) {
return;
}
int itemSlot = p.stream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA();
int interfaceId = p.stream.readUnsignedWord();
int junk = p.stream.readUnsignedWord();
int itemId = p.stream.readUnsignedWord();
if (itemSlot < 0 || itemId < 0) {
return;
}
PlayerItems pi = new PlayerItems();
switch (interfaceId) {
/*
* LunalaSummoning System
* Made By Evanna
* Muu
* You Have Been Warned…
*/

/**
 * Lunala Summoning System
 * Made By Evanna
 * Muu
 * You Have Been Warned..
 */

case 12175:
pi.deleteItem(p, 12047, itemSlot, 1); // Summoning: Spirt Wolf
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Sprit Wolf”);
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(6829, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(10, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
break;
case 12171:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 3) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12043, itemSlot, 1); // Summoning: Dreadfowl
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Dreadfowl”);
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(6825, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(20, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 4) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 4 summoning to Summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 12662:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 97) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12790, itemSlot, 1); //Summoning: Steel titan
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(7344, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Steel Titan”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 98) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 98 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 12942:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 34) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12814, itemSlot, 1); //Summoning: voif shifter
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(7367, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A void shifter”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 34) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 34 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 11893:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 33) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12021, itemSlot, 1); //beaver
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(6808, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Beaver”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 33) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 33 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 12177:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 18) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12049, itemSlot, 1); //wyrm
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(6831, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Desert wyrm”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 18) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 18 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 12187:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 10) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12059, itemSlot, 1); //Spirit spider
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(6841, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Spirit spider”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 18) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 10 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 12946:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 34) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12818, itemSlot, 1); //Void Ravager
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(7370, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Void Ravager”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 34) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 34 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 12191:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 25) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12063, itemSlot, 1); //Spirit kalphite
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(6994, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Spirit kalphite”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 25) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 25 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 12650:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 17) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12778 , itemSlot, 1); //Spirit Mosquito
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(7331, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Spirit Mosquito”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 17) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 17 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 11881:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 16) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12009 , itemSlot, 1); //Cranite Grab
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(6796, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Granite Grab”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 16) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 16 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 12193:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 32) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12065 , itemSlot, 1); //Honey Badger
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(6845, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Honey Badger”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 32) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 32 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 12928:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 29) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12800 , itemSlot, 1); //Giant chipichompa
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(7253, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Giant chipichompa”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 29) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 29 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;
case 12181:
if (p.skillLvl[23] > 31) {
pi.deleteItem(p, 12053 , itemSlot, 1); //Vampire Bat
p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663);
Server.engine.newNPC(6835, p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
p.addSkillXP(234, 23);
p.requestGFX(1315, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You Summon A Vampire bat”);

	} if (p.skillLvl[23] < 31) {
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need at least level 31 summoning to summon those.");	
		return; 
	}

break;

    case 387: // Unequip item.
        if (itemSlot < p.equipment.length && p.equipment[itemSlot] == itemId) {
            if (!Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, p.equipment[itemSlot], p.equipmentN[itemSlot])) {
                break;
            }
            p.equipment[itemSlot] = -1;
            p.equipmentN[itemSlot] = 0;
            p.frames.setItems(p, 387, 28, 94, p.equipment, p.equipmentN);
            p.playerWeapon.setWeapon();
            p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
            p.updateReq = true;
            p.calculateEquipmentBonus();
        }
        break;
    default:
        Misc.println("[" + p.username + "] Item option 1: " + interfaceId);
        break;
    }
}

}
[/code]
